popup.title: Thank you very much for using DPWT!
popup.content1: You will find your new Wallpaper on your download folder
popup.content2: We hope you like it, but if not, feel free to generate a different one.
popup.content3: Get as many as you like - it's free!
popup.content4: For personalized wallpaper featuring your brand or any other customization, please don't hesitate to get in touch with us on LinkedIn.
